bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign of the pupil and its surrounding tissue developing redness associated with swelling. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry qin bai pi 秦白皮：去肝中久熱，兩目赤腫疼痛，風淚不 止 , “It relieves one of chronic heat in the liver, with eye redness associated with swelling and pain, and unending tearflow”.

② Pathological Condition with eye redness and swelling. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry shan zhi zi 山梔子：除熱及消 渴口乾，目赤腫病 , “It eliminates diseases such as heat and melting thirst with dry mouth, as well as eye redness with swelling ”.
